name: Apple Tarragon Sauce
recipeIngredient: 6 tablespoons chilled unsalted butter, sliced very thin
4 tablespoons julienned Granny Smith (or other tart) apple
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a 1-quart saucepan over medium-high heat, combine the apple cider, wine, clam juice and shallots. Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer until reduced by two-thirds, 5 to 7 minutes.
Whisk in chilled butter slices. Add apple and tarragon, and salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot over grilled or broiled trout.
